name: LD50 Heaven Can Wait
description:
Heaven Can Wait

This was the first game where I have tried to tie your ability to win against every other player. In order to win the game and make it to Heaven you must collect more faith than the last person who got the most faith. I hope you enjoy playing and Good Luck!

And just to answer the obvious question. Yes! I have been watching too much Sword Art Online!

:)

Instructions

- left/right arrow to move and up arrow to jump

- collect fluctlight to delay darkness

- find faith symbols to reach heaven

- look out for the seven deadly sins as they will remove your faith and get in your way

- you must collect more faith than the last winner in order to reach heaven and leave your name

- the amount of faith needed to win will continue to rise as more people play and beat the highest faith score
